import React, { Component } from 'react' import DigitButton from './DigitButton' import OperationButton from './OperationButton' class Calculator extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { PreviousOperand: "", PreviousOperand: "", Operator: "", } } digitOperation = () => { this.setState({ PreviousOperand }) } render() { return (
{this.state.PreviousOperand} {this.state.Operator}
{this.state.CurrentOperand}
) } } export default Calculator
